tooltip.en: A list of additional measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions about the specimen in a format that allows programmatic parsing of the data Example(s): awnLengthInMeters=0.014, heightInMeters=1.5, relativeHumidity=28, airTemperatureInC=22. See Darwin Core's dynamicProperties.

meta.name: Dynamic Properties
meta.source: Darwin Core Quick Reference Guide, TDWG
